input.check_name: Fire Extinguisher Installation Check - Building A 1st Floor Corridor
input.check_description: Verify that Building A (Page 1) has 2 or more ABC-type fire extinguishers installed in the 1st floor corridor and all are within their valid date

input.check_name: Emergency Light Battery Backup Time Check - Building A
input.check_description: Verify that Building A (Page 1) emergency lights have a battery backup time of at least 120 minutes or more

input.check_name: Sprinkler System Installation Check - Building A
input.check_description: Verify that Building A (Page 1) has a sprinkler system installed
